config-header-mssql: Used as a section heading on the installer form, inside of a fieldset
config-mssql-old:
Used as an error message. Parameters:
* $1 - minimum version
* $2 - the version of Microsoft SQL Server that has been installed
{{Related|Config-old}}
config-mssql-install-auth:
Used as the help text for the "Authentication type" radio button when typing in database settings for installation.

Refers to {{msg-mw|Config-mssql-windowsauth}}.

See also:
* {{msg-mw|Config-mssql-web-auth}}
config-mssql-web-auth:
Used as the help text for the "Authentication type" radio button when typing in database settings for normal wiki usage.

Refers to {{msg-mw|Config-mssql-windowsauth}}.

See also:
* {{msg-mw|Config-mssql-install-auth}}
config-mssql-sqlauth:
Radio button.

"SQL Server" refers to "Microsoft SQL Server".

See also:
* {{msg-mw|Config-mssql-windowsauth}}
version-db-mssql-url: {{ignored}}URL to the website of Microsoft SQL Server
